title: Key West Chicken
summary: This recipe from the Florida Keys is the best marinade for chicken, and it only takes 30 minutes from prep till you can grill! Its a great blend of flavors with honey, soy sauce, and lime juice.
author: By TINA B

title: Bacon-Ranch Chicken Enchiladas
summary: Use your leftover rotisserie chicken to whip up these enchiladas in a mild bacon-ranch dressing sauce.
author: By krimille

title: Spanish Rice Bake
summary: Ground beef, fresh onion, green bell pepper, tomatoes and rice are simmered in a sweet-hot sauce then baked with Cheddar and garnished with fresh cilantro.
author: By MELODIE

title: No-Noodle Zucchini Lasagna
summary: Thin slices of zucchini stand in for noodles in this lasagna. It is perfect in the summer with your garden-fresh veggies and herbs, or in the winter when you need a comforting meal.
author: By Jill Welch

title: Slow-Cooker Pepper Steak
summary: Tasty strips of sirloin are seasoned with garlic powder, then slow cooked with onion, green pepper, and stewed tomatoes for this easy and comforting dinner.
author: By MJWAGNER68

title: Delicious Egg Salad for Sandwiches
summary: Make the perfect egg salad for sandwiches!
author: By wifeyluvs2cook

title: Penne with Chicken and Asparagus
summary: A light but super-tasty pasta dish, with fresh asparagus cooked in broth with sauteed garlic and seasoned chicken.
author: By LAUREL B

title: Pineapple Sticky Ribs
summary: These savory pork ribs are baked in a sticky-sweet mixture of pineapple tidbits, apricot jam, and soy sauce to create a crowd-pleasing meal.
author: By SUNKIST2

title: Garlic Pork Roast
summary: A pork roast is slow cooked with sweet potatoes, onion and garlic.
author: By Brandy

title: Fish Tacos
summary: Beer battered cod are the star of these fresh and tasty fish tacos, served in corn tortillas with shredded cabbage and a zesty white sauce.
author: By BREESE823

title: Kielbasa with Peppers and Potatoes
summary: Kielbasa cooked with red and yellow peppers and potatoes.
author: By Jeff Maloney

title: Worlds Best Honey Garlic Pork Chops
summary: A quick and simple grilled pork chop that everyone will love featuring a simple and easy glaze of ketchup, honey, soy sauce, and garlic.
author: By John Chandler

title: Mediterranean Chicken
summary: The lightness of white wine contrasts with plenty of garlic, onion and herbed tomatoes in this simmered chicken dish highlighted with the piquancy of Kalamata olives.
author: By Robyn Webb

title: Chili Dog Casserole II
summary: Beef franks, chili and beans, tortillas and Cheddar cheese form the layers of this deceptively simple and unnusual casserole.
author: By Maxine Miller

title: Stuffed Pepper Soup I
summary: Browned ground beef is combined in this tomato based soup with chopped green peppers, cooked rice, beef bouillon,  brown sugar and soy sauce.
author: By Holly

title: Hearty Breakfast Cookies
summary: These cookies are a delicious grab-and-go treat. Try one with your morning coffee or pack one in your lunch.
author: By Janet Allen

title: Mexican Zucchini Cheese Soup
summary: This flavorful soup is made with chicken broth, zucchini, summer squash, and VelveetaÂ®, spiced up with green chiles and topped with cilantro. Serve with warm tortillas.
author: By Always Cooking

title: California Chicken
summary: Sauteed chicken topped with tomato, Monterey jack, and a crowning glory of silky avocado slices.
author: By Ingrid
